Jayde returns after a few moments, with Devilcat.  The leader of the 
Rogues doesn't beat around the bush:  "There's been a rather 
unexpected development.  Our sensor records tell us that a second 
wave of Tripredacus forces have arrived on this planet.  In our 
opinion, this is trouble.  You have a more recent idea of the 
situation on Cybertron than us.  What are your thoughts?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil doesn't acknowledge Jayde's departure. He just goes on 
> thinking about how a band of rebel maximals could go so low as to 
go 
> against all their teachings.
> 
> Yggdrasil: And with Pumpskin now in predacon hands... Primus help 
> me...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "It's been about a week."  The blue-and-black femme props her 
head 
> in 
> > her hands.  "Most of the crew is down - it's getting to be a real 
> > pain.  Especially now that we're being pulled into the local 
> > conflict.  By the way, Lunara's formal career ended about ten 
years 
> > ago, so a lot of people don't remember her that well."
> > 
> > A beeping tone alerts her to the return of the strike 
force.  "Oh, 
> > excuse me."  She hops down and darts out of the room.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil: The name sounds familiar, but I've been stationed 
for a 
> > bit 
> > > on a fringe world, so I might not know her very good. How long 
has 
> > she 
> > > been in stasis lock?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > "Well, you might remember my sister, Lunara - one of the best 
> > > Maximal 
> > > > entertainers there ever was.  She choreographed all her own 
> > > > routines.  I was her assistant - and I still am, or would be 
if 
> > she 
> > > > wasn't in stasis lock because of that energy storm we ran 
> > into ..." 
> > > > Jayde trails off, obviously upset over her older sibling's 
> > > condition.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Yggdrasil slightly bent his head and thought.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Yggdrasil: I can't deny that. What did you do before 
joining 
> > the 
> > > > > rogues?
